DOC.brief_summary: To compare clinical outcome dual antiplatelet therapy aspirin ticagrelor vs. ticagrelor monotherapy 3 month PCI patient acute coronary syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Ticagrelor Monotherapy After 3 Months Patients Treated With New Generation Sirolimus Stent Acute Coronary Syndrome ( TICO Study )
DOC.criteria: Patients ≥ 19 year old Patients receive new generation sirolimuseluting ( Osiro® ) stent implantation treat ACS Patients without significant clinical event MI , stent thrombosis revascularization 3 month PCI Provision inform consent Age > 80 year Increased risk bleeding , anemia , thrombocytopenia A need oral anticoagulation therapy Pregnant woman woman potential childbearing Life expectancy < 1 year Patients treat strong CYP3A4 inhibitor ( e.g . ketoconazole , clarithromycin , nefazodone , ritonavir , atazanavir ) Patients history intracranial hemorrhage Moderate severe hepatic dysfunction Increased risk bradycardiarelated symptom ( Guidance reference )
